column4: does anyone know of a good data base program for keeping track of customers and work that I have done?
I only have a p2 366 laptop to run it on
or I would use Open Office 2.0\
how much ram does the system have?
yea, it would run it nicely.
is it possible to upgrade to 2.0?
you need to make sure you have the other repositories
then run sudo apt-get remove openoffice.org
and then run sudo apt-get install openoffice.org2
hold on, i'll get the right line ofr the second
ok the second line is: sudo apt-get install openoffice.org2 openoffice.org2-calc
